verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Again the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man דַּבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> dab-Ber speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- to the children עַמְּךָ֙ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha of thy people וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, upon אֶ֕רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz upon a land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- If אָבִ֥יא <WH935> 'a-Vi unto them When I bring עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha and חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> Cha-rev; the sword וְלָקְח֨וּ <WH3947> ve-la-ke-Chu take עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- if the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the land אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man אֶחָד֙ <WH259> 'e-Chad a מִקְצֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7097> mik-tzei-Hem, of their coasts וְנָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> ve-na-te-Nu and set אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> o-To לָהֶ֖ם <WH99999> la-Hem לְצֹפֶֽה׃ <WH6822> le-tzo-Peh. him for their watchman

וְרָאָ֥ה <WH7200> ve-ra-'Ah If when he seeth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ha-Che-rev the sword בָּאָ֣ה <WH935> ba-'Ah come עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; upon the land וְתָקַ֥ע <WH8628> ve-ta-Ka' he blow בַּשּׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> bash-sho-Far the trumpet וְהִזְהִ֥יר <WH2094> ve-hiz-Hir and warn אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. the people

וְשָׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> ve-sha-Ma' Then whosoever הַשֹּׁמֵ֜עַ <WH8085> hash-sho-Me-a' heareth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ק֤וֹל <WH6963> Kol the sound הַשּׁוֹפָר֙ <WH7782> hash-sho-Far of the trumpet וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and does not נִזְהָ֔ר <WH2094> niz-Har, and taketh not warning וַתָּ֥בוֹא <WH935> vat-Ta-Vo come חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev if the sword וַתִּקָּחֵ֑הוּ <WH3947> vat-tik-ka-Che-hu; and take him away דָּמ֥וֹ <WH1818> da-Mo his blood בְרֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> ve-ro-Sho shall be upon his own head יִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> Yih-Yeh. become

אֵת֩ <WH853> 'et ק֨וֹל <WH6963> Kol the sound הַשּׁוֹפָ֤ר <WH7782> hash-sho-Far of the trumpet שָׁמַע֙ <WH8085> sha-Ma' He heard וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not נִזְהָ֔ר <WH2094> niz-Har, and took not warning דָּמ֖וֹ <WH1818> da-Mo his blood בּ֣וֹ bo יִֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh; become וְה֥וּא <WH1931> ve-Hu he נִזְהָ֖ר <WH2094> niz-Har shall be upon him But he that taketh warning נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <WH5315> naf-Sho his soul מִלֵּֽט׃ <WH4422> mil-Let. shall deliver

וְ֠הַצֹּפֶה <WH6822> Ve-hatz-tzo-feh But if the watchman כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- if יִרְאֶ֨ה <WH7200> yir-'Eh see אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֶ֜רֶב <WH2719> ha-Che-rev the sword בָּאָ֗ה <WH935> ba-'Ah, come וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and does not תָקַ֤ע <WH8628> ta-Ka' and blow בַּשּׁוֹפָר֙ <WH7782> bash-sho-Far not the trumpet וְהָעָ֣ם <WH5971> ve-ha-'Am and the people לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- are not נִזְהָ֔ר <WH2094> niz-Har, be not warned וַתָּב֣וֹא <WH935> vat-ta-Vo come חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev, if the sword וַתִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> vat-tik-Kach and take מֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> me-Hem like נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> Na-fesh; [any] person ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu he בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> ba-'a-vo-No in his iniquity נִלְקָ֔ח <WH3947> nil-Kach, from among them he is taken away וְדָמ֖וֹ <WH1818> ve-da-Mo but his blood מִיַּֽד־ <WH3027> mi-yad- hand הַצֹּפֶ֥ה <WH6822> hatz-tzo-Peh at the watchman's אֶדְרֹֽשׁ׃ <WH1875> 'ed-Rosh. will I require ס sa-Mek

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- So thou O son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man צֹפֶ֥ה <WH6822> tzo-Peh thee a watchman נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> ne-tat-Ti-cha I have set לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֤ <WH8085> ve-sha-ma'-Ta therefore thou shalt hear מִפִּי֙ <WH6310> mip-Pi at my mouth דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> da-Var, the word וְהִזְהַרְתָּ֥ <WH2094> ve-hiz-har-Ta and warn אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-ni. at

בְּאָמְרִ֣י <WH559> be-'a-me-Ri When I say לָרָשָׁ֗ע <WH7563> la-ra-Sha', unto the wicked רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> ra-Sha' O wicked מ֣וֹת <WH4191> Mot [man] thou shalt surely תָּמ֔וּת <WH4191> ta-Mut, die וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not דִבַּ֔רְתָּ <WH1696> dib-Bar-ta, if thou dost not speak לְהַזְהִ֥יר <WH2094> le-haz-Hir to warn רָשָׁ֖ע <WH7563> ra-Sha' the wicked מִדַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> mid-dar-Ko; from his way ה֤וּא <WH1931> hu he רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> ra-Sha' that wicked בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> ba-'a-vo-No in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> ya-Mut, [man] shall die וְדָמ֖וֹ <WH1818> ve-da-Mo but his blood מִיָּדְךָ֥ <WH3027> mi-ya-de-Cha at thine hand אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH1245> 'a-vak-Kesh. will I require

וְ֠אַתָּה <WH859> Ve-'at-tah your part כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- if הִזְהַ֨רְתָּ <WH2094> hiz-Har-ta Nevertheless if thou warn רָשָׁ֤ע <WH7563> ra-Sha' the wicked מִדַּרְכּוֹ֙ <WH1870> mid-dar-Ko of his way לָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> la-Shuv to turn מִמֶּ֔נָּה <WH4480> mi-Men-nah, at וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- does not שָׁ֖ב <WH7725> shav from it if he do not turn מִדַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> mid-dar-Ko; from his way ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu he בַּעֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> ba-'a-vo-No in his iniquity יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> ya-Mut, he shall die וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah your part נַפְשְׁךָ֥ <WH5315> naf-she-Cha thy soul הִצַּֽלְתָּ׃ <WH5337> hitz-Tzal-ta. but thou hast delivered ס sa-Mek

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- Therefore O thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man אֱמֹר֙ <WH559> 'e-Mor speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> ken Thus אֲמַרְתֶּם֙ <WH559> 'a-mar-Tem Thus ye speak לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Surely פְשָׁעֵ֥ינוּ <WH6588> fe-sha-'Ei-nu If our transgressions וְחַטֹּאתֵ֖ינוּ <WH2403> ve-chat-to-Tei-nu and our sins עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu; and וּבָ֛ם <WH99999> u-Vam אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu we נְמַקִּ֖ים <WH4743> ne-mak-Kim [be] upon us and we pine away וְאֵ֥יךְ <WH349> ve-'Eich how נִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> Nich-Yeh. in them how should we then live

אֱמֹ֨ר <WH559> 'e-Mor Say אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem unto חַי־ <WH2416> chai- unto them [As] I live אָ֣נִי׀ <WH589> 'A-ni I נְאֻ֣ם׀ <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD אִם־ <WH518> 'im- no אֶחְפֹּץ֙ <WH2654> 'ech-Potz I have no pleasure בְּמ֣וֹת <WH4194> be-Mot in the death הָרָשָׁ֔ע <WH7563> ha-ra-Sha', of the wicked כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- no בְּשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> be-Shuv turn רָשָׁ֛ע <WH7563> ra-Sha' but that the wicked מִדַּרְכּ֖וֹ <WH1870> mid-dar-Ko from his way וְחָיָ֑ה <WH2421> ve-cha-Yah; and live שׁ֣וּבוּ <WH7725> Shu-vu turn שׁ֜וּבוּ <WH7725> Shu-vu ye turn מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֧ם <WH1870> mid-dar-chei-Chem ways הָרָעִ֛ים <WH7451> ha-ra-'Im ye from your evil וְלָ֥מָּה <WH4100> ve-Lam-mah Why תָמ֖וּתוּ <WH4191> ta-Mu-tu for why will ye die בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit O house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. Israel פ Peh

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- Therefore thou son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man אֱמֹ֤ר <WH559> 'e-Mor say אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- and בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- unto the children עַמְּךָ֙ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha of thy people צִדְקַ֣ת <WH6666> tzid-Kat The righteousness הַצַּדִּ֗יק <WH6662> hatz-tzad-Dik, of the righteous לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo will not תַצִּילֶ֙נּוּ֙ <WH5337> tatz-tzi-Len-nu shall not deliver בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom him in the day פִּשְׁע֔וֹ <WH6588> pish-'O, of his transgression וְרִשְׁעַ֤ת <WH7564> ve-rish-'At as for the wickedness הָֽרָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> ha-ra-Sha' of the wicked לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- he will not יִכָּ֣שֶׁל <WH3782> yik-Ka-shel he shall not fall בָּ֔הּ <WH99999> Bah, בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom thereby in the day שׁוּב֣וֹ <WH7725> shu-Vo that he turneth מֵֽרִשְׁע֑וֹ <WH7562> me-rish-'O; from his wickedness וְצַדִּ֗יק <WH6662> ve-tzad-Dik, neither shall the righteous לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not יוּכַ֛ל <WH3201> yu-Chal be able לִֽחְי֥וֹת <WH2421> lich-Yot to live בָּ֖הּ <WH99999> bah בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom for his [righteousness] in the day חֲטֹאתֽוֹ׃ <WH2398> cha-to-To. that he sinneth

בְּאָמְרִ֤י <WH559> be-'a-me-Ri When I shall say לַצַּדִּיק֙ <WH6662> latz-tzad-Dik to the righteous חָיֹ֣ה <WH2421> cha-Yoh [that] he shall surely יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <WH2421> yich-Yeh, live וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> ve-hu- he בָטַ֥ח <WH982> va-Tach if he trust עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in צִדְקָת֖וֹ <WH6666> tzid-ka-To to his own righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> ve-'A-sah and commit עָ֑וֶל <WH5766> 'A-vel; iniquity כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner; צִדְקָתֹו tzid-ka-tov כצִדְקֹתָיו֙ <WH6666> tzid-ko-Tav his righteousness קלֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not תִזָּכַ֔רְנָה <WH2142> tiz-za-Char-nah, shall not be remembered וּבְעַוְל֥וֹ <WH5766> u-ve-'av-Lo but for his iniquity אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- of his which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah that he hath committed בּ֥וֹ <WH99999> bo יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> ya-Mut. he shall die

וּבְאָמְרִ֥י <WH559> u-ve-'a-me-Ri Again when I say לָֽרָשָׁ֖ע <WH7563> la-ra-Sha' unto the wicked מ֣וֹת <WH4191> Mot Thou shalt surely תָּמ֑וּת <WH4191> ta-Mut; die וְשָׁב֙ <WH7725> ve-Shav if he turn מֵֽחַטָּאת֔וֹ <WH2403> me-chat-ta-To, from his sin וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> ve-'a-Sah and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> mish-Pat that which is lawful וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> u-tze-da-Kah. and right

חֲבֹ֨ל <WH2258> cha-Vol the pledge יָשִׁ֤יב <WH7725> ya-Shiv restore רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> ra-Sha' [If] the wicked גְּזֵלָ֣ה <WH1500> ge-ze-Lah that he had robbed יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <WH7999> ye-shal-Lem, give again בְּחֻקּ֤וֹת <WH2708> be-chuk-Kot in the statutes הַֽחַיִּים֙ <WH2416> ha-chai-Yim of life הָלַ֔ךְ <WH1980> ha-Lach, walk לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti without עֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> a-Sot without committing עָ֑וֶל <WH5766> 'A-vel; iniquity חָי֥וֹ <WH2421> cha-Yo he shall surely יִֽחְיֶ֖ה <WH2421> yich-Yeh live לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> ya-Mut. he shall not die

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner; חַטָּאתֹו chat-ta-tov כחַטֹּאתָיו֙ <WH2403> chat-to-Tav sin קאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher he חָטָ֔א <WH2398> cha-Ta, that he hath committed לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not תִזָּכַ֖רְנָה <WH2142> tiz-za-Char-nah shall be mentioned ל֑וֹ lo; מִשְׁפָּ֧ט <WH4941> mish-Pat that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֛ה <WH6666> u-tze-da-Kah and right עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah unto him he hath done חָי֥וֹ <WH2421> cha-Yo he shall surely יִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> Yich-Yeh. live

וְאָמְרוּ֙ <WH559> ve-'a-me-Ru say בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei Yet the children עַמְּךָ֔ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha, of thy people לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo is not יִתָּכֵ֖ן <WH8505> yit-ta-Chen is not equal דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech The way אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; of the Lord וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> ve-Hem-mah like דַּרְכָּ֥ם <WH1870> dar-Kam but as for them their way לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- is not יִתָּכֵֽן׃ <WH8505> yit-ta-Chen. is not equal

בְּשׁוּב־ <WH7725> be-shuv- turneth צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik When the righteous מִצִּדְקָת֖וֹ <WH6666> mitz-tzid-ka-To from his righteousness וְעָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> ve-'A-sah and committeth עָ֑וֶל <WH5766> 'A-vel; iniquity וּמֵ֖ת <WH4191> u-Met he shall even die בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וּבְשׁ֤וּב <WH7725> u-ve-Shuv turn רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> ra-Sha' But if the wicked מֵֽרִשְׁעָת֔וֹ <WH7564> me-rish-'a-To, from his wickedness וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> ve-'a-Sah and do מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> mish-Pat that which is lawful וּצְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> u-tze-da-Kah; and right עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and ה֥וּא <WH1931> hu he יִֽחְיֶֽה׃ <WH2421> Yich-Yeh. he shall live

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH559> va-'a-mar-Tem Yet ye say לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo is not יִתָּכֵ֖ן <WH8505> yit-ta-Chen is not equal דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech The way אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; of the Lord אִ֧ישׁ <WH376> 'ish you every one כִּדְרָכָ֛יו <WH1870> kid-ra-Chav after his ways אֶשְׁפּ֥וֹט <WH8199> esh-Pot I will judge אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit O ye house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh
